meanings.definition: A conqueror, especially one of the Spanish soldiers who conquered Mexico, Peru, and other parts of Central and South America in the 16th century.
meanings.sent1: The conquistadors bravely explored new lands and claimed them for their country.
meanings.sent2: Many conquistadors sought riches and adventure in distant lands.
meanings.sent3: The conquistadors were so eager to find gold that they searched everywhere, even in the most unlikely places.
meanings.sent4: In the history books, the conquistadors are portrayed as fearless warriors who changed the course of history.
meanings.sent5: The image of the conquistadors riding on horseback into battle is etched in our minds.
